name: Pustulent Shambler
description: A large, amorphous ooze that can absorb flesh and move stealthily through narrow spaces, capable of poisoning and debilitating enemies with a foul stench and the Bonerot disease.
memorable: The ability to absorb corpses to regain health and infect others with Bonerot makes it a terrifying foe.
goals: To consume flesh for sustenance and spread Bonerot disease.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead or oozes.
environment: Typically found in decay-ridden locations or near battlefields of the fallen.
strengths: Resilient due to high hit points and capabilities to damage and weaken foes.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks; predictable behavior due to lack of intelligence.
attacks: Makes multiple pseudopod attacks dealing bludgeoning and acid damage and can infect with Bonerot disease.
most_powerful_ability: The Bonerot ability that weakens victims over time and can lead to death if untreated.
senses: Blindsight 60 ft., allowing it to navigate despite being blind beyond that radius.
additional_information: Can move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch.
Infects with Bonerot disease that weakens physical capabilities.
Corrosive effect on bone, damaging weapons made of bone.
Possesses a foul stench that poisons nearby creatures.
Regains health by consuming corpses, enhancing its durability.
test_queries: creature that moves through tight spaces
pustulent monster with a foul stench
